title: More of the World and its Likeness
content:

[[module css]]
#page-content .collapsible-block {  
  max-width: 100%;
    /* text-align: center; */
    text-align: center;
text-color: black;
    border-color: #b01;
    border: solid 1px #b01;
    background-color: #E6DD93;
}
.collapsible-block-content p {
    text-align: left;
    padding-left: 5px;
    padding-right: 5px;
}
blockquote {
    border: 1px double #999;
    /* padding: 0 1em; */
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
}
[[/module]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#f2f2c2; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTICE FROM THE FOUNDATION HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT

Information on this page is subject to change. Please stop sending emails to this page in particular.

-- Osiris Wentworth, HR Liason, HRD
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[size 150%]]
##green|Accessing Files...##

[[/size]]

[[collapsible show="De-Classified Files" hide="Close"]]
[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/transmission-p1-deepspace TRANSMISSION-P1-DEEPSPACE]] ;
//"I remember the day I thought the world ended."//

[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/ideals Ideals]] - ;
//"Peace was an unsuccessful focus test with the entire human population as its subject; It was teased and teased until humanity screamed for the teasing to stop."//

[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/treading-around-the-fuzz Treading around the Fuzz]] ;
//"It wasn't hard to pay attention to everything when two of your friends had been taken by the pseudo-government."//

[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/the-old-town-of-bridgewater The Bridgewater Incident]] - ;
//"Together, a three, may have been considered a gift. None remember their old town of Bridgewater."//
(Collaborative piece with [[*user Doctor North]]!)

[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/the-fear-of-infinity The Fear of Infinity]] - ;
//"I've been waiting. For what, though? I have not a clue."//

[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/osiris-wentworth-and-his-wonderful-day-at-work Osiris Wentworth and his Wonderful Day at Work]] - ;
//"The idea of the Foundation having a Human Resources Department was kind of stupid."//
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Webcrawler Files" hide="Close"]]

> [[=]]
> ++++ NOTICE FROM THE FOUNDATION MEME AGENCY.
> 
> North insisted I made something for him. So, for the Site 19 IRC Chat, you are graced with this.
> 
> -- Your friend, MoreWorldliness
> 

[[size 150%]] {{WELCOME TO THE NORTH CORNER}} [[/size]]
> Oh wow, look, a North!
> 
> Do you have the new [[[subject-north | North]]]^^tm^^?
> 
> North North North North North North North North North North North North[[footnote]]One for all the pings[[/footnote]]
> 
> --North is forcing me to write this help-- {{WOW ISN'T NORTH SURE GREAT HUH}}[[footnote]]I'm not sorry :)[[/footnote]]


[[size 150%]] {{WELCOME TO THE XILAS CORNER}} [[/size]]
> .
> .
> .
> xilas has no corner.
> xilas only consumes.
> .
> .
> .
[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]
